title: Grant (W. R. O.)
body:
An ornithologist from the British Museum who scientifically explored the Selvagens. He published a work titled *On the Birds observed in the 
Salvage Islands near Madeira* in the 1896 edition of *The Ibis* (pp. 41-55), and in the magazines *The Field* and *The Zoologist*, an account of his trip to the Selvagens. This last work, in which he collaborated with Cecil Bering, is titled *An Expedition to Salvage 
Islands*.

1896:
Publication of the work *On the Birds observed in the 
Salvage Islands near Madeira*
